bio: Day to day dad and manager, using crypto for fun and loving to be creative in defi
impactDescription:
- moving capital from major multichain projects to OpenX which is a small Optimism dedicated project, both for the vaults as for the (ve)NFT market. 
- creating a decentral liquid wrapper for veVelo which allows especially major MarketCap or Ecosystem project to effectively build a base APR rate on velodrome.

impactMetrics.description: Total opxvelo LP TVL in velodrome in $

pwCategorySuggestions: Tokenization Platforms, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Web3 Community Platform
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, the application is miscategorized because although it is filled out by an individual, it discusses the contributions and impacts of a project (OpenX). It should be categorized as a "PROJECT".
